thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Buwog takes positive stance on Vonovia offer

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Buwog takes positive stance on Vonovia offer
text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Buwog:
* DGAP-NEWS: BUWOG AG TAKES NOTE OF THE OFFER DOCUMENT BY VONOVIA SE AND WILL EXAMINE IT ACCORDINGLY
* ‍BUWOG AG TAKES NOTE OF OFFER DOCUMENT BY VONOVIA SE AND WILL EXAMINE IT ACCORDINGLY​
* ‍BUWOG WILL EXAMINE OFFER CAREFULLY AND EXPECT TO PUBLISH A DETAILED, REASONED OPINION ON 13 FEBRUARY 2018​
* ‍MANAGEMENT BOARD AND SUPERVISORY BOARD OF BUWOG AG CONTINUE TO HAVE A POSITIVE STANCE TOWARDS OFFER.​ Further company coverage:
